amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete Wildlife Conservation and Restoration definitions contained in title III.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 106-612 to strike a provision in Title III of CARA which opens the door for funding to go to organizations which engage in "public-outreach", species re-introduction and certain other uses not currently in law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chenoweth-Hage amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 317 (Roll no. 173).
